name: Into the Light (itch) (revouwu)
description:
Into the Light is a story driven 2D Platformer game with a touch of size-based puzzles sprinkled throughout the levels.

The player takes control of a man reminiscing through his past, entering the small world of memories inside his room and recalling each moment which made him realize the world around him is bigger then he thought and how insignificant his problems were compared to it.

The game was made during the ‘Ludum Dare 38’ where the theme was A Small World.
